nodes.bodyText:
I wonder if we should just call this ChainHead or ChainPoint or ChainLink or something...  It's not quite right but I don't really like the proliferation of XandY kind of classes and would love to come up with better names for them.
Potentially we could just use this class to replace a bunch of them since the slot could just be taken from the state and then be equivalent to SignedBlockAndState which may be what you mean by a bigger refactoring.  Definitely happy to defer that change.
